message: Who's in the program now? Who's considering applying? Thoughts?
@apoo cool! where are you now? and what's the most attractive thing about the program (besides the money, or is that it)?
I'm definitely going to apply. I love the idea of spending six months in Chile, and the money means I'd still be able to provide for my family while starting up.

Definitely considering... After bootstrapping for a year in the SF Bay Area, it seems that Chile would be a welcome fresh breath of air in a lot of senses, and ultimately help our company accelerate "wisdom-gathering" across languages/cultures/business atmospheres that would make subsequent expansions to new locales that much easier.
I'm from India and I'm applying! Bootstrapped after graduation we're 1.5 years old startup, pretty much stable and growing. Any idea how to pitch them about our help to promote chile economy?
@bengl you should consider make links between the objectives of their country development plan and your startup and work on it for your speech
